de.esoco.lib.comm

Class HttpEndpoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.obrel.core.RelatedObject
      • de.esoco.lib.expression.function.AbstractFunction<org.obrel.core.Relatable,Connection>
        • de.esoco.lib.comm.Endpoint
          • de.esoco.lib.comm.HttpEndpoint
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    de.esoco.lib.property.Fluent<Endpoint>, java.util.function.Function<org.obrel.core.Relatable,Connection>, org.obrel.core.FluentRelatable<Endpoint>, org.obrel.core.Relatable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ModificationSyncEndpoint

    public class HttpEndpoint
extends Endpoint
    An endpoint that connects to an HTTP or HTTPS address and allows to perform HTTP requests. After an HTTP request has been executed the parameters CommunicationRelationTypes.HTTP_STATUS_CODE and CommunicationRelationTypes.HTTP_RESPONSE_HEADERS on the Connection object will contain the respective values as returned by the endpoint.

    • Method Detail

      • httpGet

        public static CommunicationMethod<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> httpGet()
        Returns a new HTTP GET method without a default target URL. The returned method must always be invoked with an explicit URL argument or else an exception will occur.
        Returns:
        The new communication method

      • httpGet

        public static HttpEndpoint.HttpRequest<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> httpGet(java.lang.String sTargetUrl)
        Returns a new method instance that performs a GET request by using the method input as the endpoint-relative target URL of the request.
        Parameters:
        sTargetUrl - The endpoint-relative default URL to be retrieved by the get request
        Returns:
        The new communication method

      • httpPost

        public static HttpEndpoint.HttpRequest<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> httpPost(java.lang.String sTargetUrl,
                                                                                   java.lang.String sPostData)
        Returns a new method instance that performs a POST request by transmitting the method input to a certain URL of the target endpoint.
        Parameters:
        sTargetUrl - The endpoint-relative target URL for the POST request
        sPostData - The default data to be transmitted (the method input)
        Returns:
        The new communication method

      • url

        public static java.lang.String url(java.lang.String sHost,
                                   int nPort,
                                   boolean bEncrypted)
        Builds a HTTP endpoint URL from the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        sHost - The host name or address
        nPort - The port to connect to
        bEncrypted - TRUE for an encrypted connection
        Returns:
        The resulting endpoint URL

      • closeConnection

        protected void closeConnection(Connection rConnection)
        Closes any resources that have been acquired on initializing the given connection. Any exception thrown by this method will be converted into a CommunicationException.
        Specified by:
        closeConnection in class Endpoint
        Parameters:
        rConnection - The connection to close

      • initConnection

        protected void initConnection(Connection rConnection)
        Must be implemented to initialize any resources that are needed to use the given connection. Any exception thrown by this method will be converted into a CommunicationException.
        Specified by:
        initConnection in class Endpoint
        Parameters:
        rConnection - The connection to initialize
